1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Derived operators for nested relations.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest.Deriv
6  ( -- * opp-group
7    consOppGroup,
8    -- * self-group
9    consSelfGroup, consNest, relmapSelfGroup,
10    -- * ungroup
11    consUngroup, relmapUngroup,
12    -- * join-up
13    consJoinUp, relmapJoinUp,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture        as O
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax          as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data            as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core            as C
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base        as Rop
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat        as Rop
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest.Confl  as Rop
23
24
25-- ----------------------  opp-group
26
27-- | __opp-group R -to \/N [-share \/P ...]__
28--
29--   Opposite operand version of @group@ -- grouping relation by relmap output.
30--
31consOppGroup :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.RopCons c
32consOppGroup med =
33  do rmap <- Rop.getRelmap med "-relmap"
34     n    <- Rop.getTerm   med "-to"
35     sh   <- Rop.getMaybe Rop.getTerms med "-share"
36     Right $ relmapOppGroup med sh n rmap
37
38-- | Create @odd-group@ relmap.
39relmapOppGroup :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> Rop.SharedTerms -> S.TermName -> O.Map (C.Relmap c)
40relmapOppGroup med sh n rmap = C.relmapCopy med n' rmapGroup where
41    rmapGroup  = rmap O.++ Rop.relmapGroup med sh n rmapLocal
42    rmapLocal  = C.relmapLocalSymbol med n'
43    n'         = S.termNameContent n
44
45
46-- ----------------------  self-group
47
48-- | __nest [~] \/P ... -to \/N__
49consNest :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.RopCons c
50consNest med =
51  do (co, ns) <- Rop.getTermsCo med "-term"
52     to       <- Rop.getTerm    med "-to"
53     Right $ relmapSelfGroup med (co, ns, to)
54
55-- | __self-group \/P ... -to \/N__
56--
57--   Group input relation into the term \/N per \/P ....
58--
59consSelfGroup :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.RopCons c
60consSelfGroup med =
61  do ns <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
62     to <- Rop.getTerm  med "-to"
63     Right $ relmapSelfGroup med (True, ns, to)
64
65-- | Create @self-group@ relmap.
66relmapSelfGroup :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> (Bool, [S.TermName], S.TermName) -> C.Relmap c
67relmapSelfGroup med (co, ns, to) = group O.++ for where
68    group  = relmapOppGroup med Nothing to key
69    for    = Rop.relmapFor med to nest
70    key    = if co then pick else cut
71    nest   = if co then cut  else pick
72    pick   = Rop.relmapPick med ns
73    cut    = Rop.relmapCut  med ns
74
75
76-- ----------------------  ungroup
77
78-- | __ungroup \/P__
79--
80--   Lift up nested relation \/P and meet with non-nested terms.
81--
82consUngroup :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.RopCons c
83consUngroup med =
84  do n <- Rop.getTerm med "-term"
85     Right $ relmapUngroup med n
86
87-- | Create @ungroup@ relmap.
88relmapUngroup :: (Ord c, D.CRel c) => C.Intmed c -> S.TermName -> C.Relmap c
89relmapUngroup med n = ungroup where
90    ungroup = slice O.++ cut
91    slice   = Rop.relmapSliceUp med meet
92    meet    = Rop.relmapMeet med Nothing $ C.relmapLocalNest med n
93    cut     = Rop.relmapCut  med [n]
94
95
96-- ----------------------  join-up
97
98-- | __join-up \/P ...__
99--
100--   Join nested relations \/P ... and up to output relation.
101--
102consJoinUp :: (Ord c) => C.RopCons c
103consJoinUp med =
104  do nest <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
105     Right $ relmapJoinUp med nest
106
107-- | Create @join-up@ relmap.
108relmapJoinUp :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> [S.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
109relmapJoinUp med nest = C.relmapNest med $ Rop.relmapJoinList med rmaps where
110    rmaps   = link `map` nest
111    link n  = C.relmapLocalNest med n
